tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Undoubtedly I surely reffer Dr Ritu for each and every member of your family,  Dr Ritu is a Great Human being which is very rare these days....very polite and takes very good care of patients complaint and advises the best and needed treatment only.
We need such Doctors ... Prosper Always 😇 God bless you always 🙏
reply_text:
Thank you so much sir 
Your feedback is valuable to us 
We are glad that you had a pleasant experience during your treatment . 

Regard 
Dr. Ritu Mehta

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for my Dental filling and cleaning up my teeth. I was little skeptical and scared.But Dr.Ritu is so friendly and helpful in every possible way. She guided me what is necessary to do. She was very patient and gave detailed information  the pros and cons about the process. I successfully completed my long procedure very effectively under her supervision. Overall a good experience.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words.
Your feedback is valuable to us . Glad to know that you were happy with the treatment . 

Regards 
Dr. Ritu Mehta

review:
> A clinic where doctor possess the combo of professionalism & humanity.
> Healing patients with cheerful smile &  pleasant temperament with gentle nature. 
> Perfection of work with adherence to time
> Attends & resolve all the queries and doubts very politely
> Extremely delighted with services provided
> I sincerely applaud you.
reply_text:
Thank you so much Mam for your kind words , We appreciate your valuable feedback. It means a lot to us .

Regard 
Dr. Ritu Mehta

review: I visited the clinic for the first time as it was near my home and I needed some consultation. Ritu is very friendly, very comfortable to talk to and share your dental issues. My consultation went great and thankfully everything was alright. Would really recommend her if you have any dental issues!
reply_text:
Thank you for your valuable feedback . 
Regards,
Dr. Ritu Mehta

review:
Dr. Ritu is super friendly and professional. She knows what's to be done and communicates the procedure very effectively. Without a doubt I would recommend her for one's family dental doctor. The clinic can be located easily and it's simple and elegant compared to any dental clinics I had been before.
5 Star Rating.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your valuable feedback Mr. Varun. We are glad we could make you comfortable during the dental procedures. 

Regards
Dr. Ritu Mehta 
Dr. Ritu Mehta's Family Dental Centre

review: I had pain in my lower wisdom tooth for which an extraction was done by Dr. Ritu. It was done very smoothly as I felt very little to no pain during the extraction process. Besides the extraction Dr. Ritu recently did a root canal on my lower tooth. The environment is very good and Dr. Ritu was very calm and polite in her approach. Highly recommended!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words sir, happy  to serve .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with Dr. Ritu Mehta was excellent. She is experienced and tells all the aspects in detail. She explained me all the facts well and motivated to take the informed decision about my treatment.
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words sir. 
We are glad to know that you had a pleasant experience at our clinic throughout the treatment. 
Thank you 
Regards, 
Dr. Ritu Mehta and team
